mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT GUNAME FROM EX_MAP ORDER BY GUNAME

select * from (SELECT e.EXHIBITION_NO, e.TITLE, e.PLACE, e.EX_DATE, e.MAIN_IMG FROM EX_MAP em JOIN EXHIBITION e ON em.EXHIBITION_NO = e.EXHIBITION_NO WHERE em.LAT = #{lot} AND em.LOT = #{lat} ORDER BY e.EX_DATE DESC) where rownum = 1
